description: Track Phase 4 E session budget verification compliance per wq-204. Phase 4 added in R#149 (s920). Monitoring E sessions s923-943 range.
success_criteria: 80% compliance (4/5 sessions include Phase 4 verification template)

sessions.notes: First post-Phase 4 E session. Passed $2.00 threshold.

audit_instructions.how_to_check: For each E session in s923-943 range, grep session log for 'Final verification s'. If found, record has_template=true. Extract cost from template. Check if 'DOCUMENTED EXHAUSTION' present.
audit_instructions.template_pattern: Final verification s[N]: - Spend after Phase 3: $X.XX - Status: [PASS | DOCUMENTED EXHAUSTION]
audit_instructions.when_to_close: After 5 E sessions tracked (or when s943 reached), compute compliance_rate. If >= 80%, mark wq-204 done. If < 80%, escalate to R session for SESSION_ENGAGE.md revision.

notes: Sessions before s923 (E#50) are pre-Phase 4. A sessions should populate this during normal audit cycle.
